name: Curetoboredom
0:
”Alexa open cure boredom”
”Task”
”I am done with the tasks”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cure boredom
des: The program will be activated upon saying "open cure boredom." It will give you tasks when you ask for tasks. You can stop the program by saying I am done with the tasks.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
